group.name: addthis
group.string: AddThis use an algorithm combining the user's share history and locale to optimize the order. For example, a user who shares exclusively to Twitter would see the Twitter icon first.

If you would like to specify specific service buttons it is possible to list them here. A full list can be found at http://www.addthis.com/services/list. Specific buttons take preference over number of buttons to show. e.g. email,facebook,twitter,stumbleupon
